Text: I'll check it out, dw guys I got this.

So I've only had a chance to check out Chet in Goodsprings store; do all of the Gun Runner's new stuff have (GRA) at the end of it? That's a good thing and a bad thing: 1) Good because you'll know it's a new gun part of the DLC  immediately and 2) it gets kinda old to keep seeing that on certain weapons. I wish they would have given then all unique names.

But thanks for sharing :)

For those who think it isn't working, it does not auto give you the guns.  You have to go talk to one of the merchants, especially the Gun Runners, to get the weapons.

And let me forewarn all of you, the guns are EXPENSIVE!.
Thanks

I've downloaded the files, moved them into the data folder - just like EVERY other dlc or mod, and it won't work. I've gone to all the different NPC's that should sell the weapons, gone to unique weapon locations, ect, and it won't show up.

I also started a new game, finished Goodsprings, and ran up to New Vegas and Vendortron didn't sell any of them.

Secondly, for some reason when I exit the game, and check in Data Files in the launcher, the Gun Runners' data is no longer checked. I check it, start the game, exit, and when loading the launcher it is no longer checked.

The only other file that has done this way for me was the level cap raiser, which would uncheck itself and never worked.

Please help! Do I need to rename something? Is there a new update I need?
All my hoarding of caps finally paid off. Interesting guns and attachments, but Bethesda should have released this with HH and OWB. Overall great DLC and torrent, thanks.
